subject: Re: [junit] : Help for System Test Cases
msgSnippet: ... Yes: start with tests, and not a framework. What would your first test look like? -- J. B. Rainsberger, Diaspar Software Services
messageBody:
gunjeet sandhu wrote:

> Hi,
>
> I am currently using StrutsTestCase for unit testing
> the application.
>
> But can somebody suggest what framework to use to
> create System Test Cases.

Yes: start with tests, and not a framework.

What would your first test look like?
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
